subject: Backend
preview: Help Heath understand how they’re doing:

full_threads.body:
Hi Catherine, 


Just a quick note to confirm we add the coupon code last night as planned. Happy World MS Day and speak soon!
Joel Maligalig yep great - thanks!
Heath Maguire I just copy the "coupon description" you made from private to the current live one. Cheers !

Joel Maligalig I just saw that the client has posted a link to the live cup product in Facebook, so when you live the private product, can you please put a redirect in place or apply the changes to the live product instead? Thanks
Joel Maligalig is there any way to schedule this one? Cheers

Amazing! Thank you!!



Catherine Duong


Kiss Goodbye to MS Campaign Assistant


MS Research Australia


02 8413 7918 • 1300 356 467

Hi Catherine, 


It's set to 'Private' meaning only people with a login such as yourself can see it. All good. If you log out of the site you won't be able to see it. 


Hope that clarifies? Thanks,

Hi Heath!


I was just on the online store and noticed the special cup deal is online, are you able to please remove it and schedule it to go live on May 30 at 12am??? Sorry, I should have made it clear and said it was going to be a one day special!


Thanks so much!



Catherine Duong


Kiss Goodbye to MS Campaign Assistant

Hi Heath,


The coupon code sounds like a wonderful idea! Let’s go ahead with that! Would you be able to schedule it to go live on May 30 at 12AM/12.01AM ?


Thanks so much Health!


Also, I have another enquiry. Are you able to give me the exact image specs for ‘News’ items, ‘Events’ and ‘Shop’ in the backend?


When I was uploading the images for the ‘KGTMS Sol Keep Cups’, I was struggling to get the dimensions for the photos. I was aware that the photo size was quite large so when I was previewing them, part of the photo would get cut out and no matter I did to resize it, the photo still didn’t turn out the way I wanted.


If you’re able to help me out with that, that would be amazing!!


Again, thank you so much for your help J


Warmest regards,



Catherine Duong


Kiss Goodbye to MS Campaign Assistant

Hi Catherine, 


This will be fine and can be done by using a coupon code. We also considered if people want to order more than 2 cups that the discount would also apply. Is this the plan? 


So for example, if a person orders: 


- 1 cup = $30
- 2 cups = $50
- 3 cups = $75
- 4 cups = $100
and so on.... 


Does that suit what you had in mind? Please see the attached screenshot with how we proposed to setup the product page as well. 


Thanks and speak soon,

Thank you so much Joao!



Catherine Duong

Great, let me check with Heath and the team regarding the code that needs to be developed for this feature and we'll come back to you with the best option for it.


Thanks

Hi Joao,


I would like to add this promotion to the existing Sol Cup item.


Warmest,



Catherine Duong

Hi Catherine,


Would you like to create a new 'Shop Item' that will be 2 Cups, or do you want to add this promotion to the existing 'Cup item'?


Thanks

Hi Heath,

We have our KGTMS Sol Keep Cups on the website and would like to have a special for World MS Day. We are looking to do 2 cups for $50. How do I go about adding it to the backend? Can you please assist with this? J

Warmest regards,

Catherine
